skills.name: Pierce Soul
skills.description: Attacks the enemy twice, with each attack having a 30% chance to disturb the enemy's HP recovery for 2 turns.
skills.level_progress_description:
Effect Rate +5%
Effect Rate +5%
Damage +5%
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +15%

skill_effect.name: Disturb HP Recovery
skill_effect.description: Healing effects are blocked for a number of turns

skill_effect.name: Multiple Hits
skill_effect.description: Attack hits more than 1 time per use.

skills.name: Brand of Hell
skills.description: Attacks the enemy three times, with each attack having a 50% chance to receive a Branding effect for 2 turns. The damage increases as the enemy's HP becomes lower.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +10%
Cooltime Turn -1

skill_effect.name: Brand
skill_effect.description: Enemies with Branding Effect take 25% more Damage

skills.multiplier_formula: <mark>ATK</mark>*(-2.2*<mark data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Target's HP percentage in range 0 to 1, with 1 being full HP.">Target Current HP %</mark> + 4.4)

skills.name: Underworld King's Return(Passive)
skills.description: Revives with 30% of HP at the last dying breath and fills up the Attack Bar to the fullest amount. The Attack Power also increases by 100% each whenever revived. (Accumulates up to 3 times) [Automatic Effect]
skills.level_progress_description:
Cooltime Turn -1
Cooltime Turn -1
Cooltime Turn -1

skill_effect.name: Auto Effect
skill_effect.description: The skill effect is automatically triggered.

skill_effect.name: Increase ATB
skill_effect.description: The ATK bar of ally monsters is filled by a set amount. This allows ally monsters to attack again sooner.
